english: That man can nose out news anywhere .
chinese: 那个人在任何地方都能搜寻出新闻。
任何事情都可能在任何地方发生。

english: We may as well pass the night here as elsewhere .
chinese: 再说，在这儿过夜比任何地方都好。

english: Any place within the fault zone could have breakage .
chinese: 断层带内的任何地方都会有破裂。

english: Pvx is worldwide, occurring wherever potatoes are grown .
chinese: PVX是世界性的，发生在栽培马铃薯的任何地方。
任何地方造句挺难的，這是一个万能造句的方法

english: I'm going to aberdeen, so i can drop you anywhere along the way .
chinese: 我要去阿伯丁，这样可以把你带到沿途任何地方。

english: If we can pick up any other loans he's made anywhere else, well and good .
chinese: 假使我们可以探出他在别的任何地方搞到的其他任何借款，那就好极了。

english: The unkindness of your own relations has made you astonished to find friendship anywhere .
chinese: 你自家骨肉的冷酷，使你在任何地方发现了友情都大为惊诧。

english: As a result, freshwater animals live there at depths greater than anywhere else on earth .
chinese: 因此，淡水动物在这个湖里比在世界上其他任何地方都能在更深的水中存活。

english: In view of the moon's size, he suggests that the lunar interior is nowhere near as hot as that of the earth .
chinese: 考虑到月球的大小，他提示说月球内部没有任何地方象地球内部那样热。

english: With the help of special radio telescope, the intensity of radiation can be measured in different parts of the sky .
chinese: 借助于专门的射电望远镜，就可以测量天空中任何地方辐射的强度。

english: I have seen small population almost wiped out by fungus at the same time as dense aphis populations elsewhere .
chinese: 我曾见到小的群体在其它任何地方的高密度蚜群被真菌杀死的同时差不多也被杀死了。

english: The first three types are sporadically noted in every part of the world, where they are frowned upon by the majority .
chinese: 前面3种类型在世界的任何地方都可能偶然地出现，但是会遭到大多数人的谴责。

english: Although there might not be much at first appearance to captivate, there was, at least, nothing to disgust her relations .
chinese: 初来乍到虽然看不出有多少媚人之处，但至少没有任何地方叫亲戚们看了讨厌。

english: This is one of the oldest expedients, and it can be practiced anywhere, at any age, and with or without the use of hallucinogens .
chinese: 这是最古老的手法之一，任何年龄的人在任何地方无论用不用幻觉剂都可使用。
